name: You are not alone (TeeGeeVee)
description:
Feeling overwhelmed about your e-mail inbox? You are not alone!

In this game you forward e-mails to your co-workers.
Mails drop in the inbox on the left. You have to drag them to the inbox of your colleagues so they can work on it. You have a timer for the day and need to forward as many mails as you can. Mails with more (+) take longer to complete but give you more points. Pay attention to spam mails! They lower your score.

This game was built for my first game-jam ever (Brackeys 2022.2): "You are not alone".

NOTE: You might need to resize the webpage.
